coverAlt: A classic graphic of the evolution of man except the last step is a man pushing a stroller
title: Working Dad's Survival Guide
subTitle: How to Succeed at Work and at Home
author: Scott Behson, PhD
description: This is a title that I received as a gift from a new parent networking group at work. I found this book and that group equally useful when navigating a big life change.
